description:
What you’ll be doing:

As Business Development Manager, you will be involved in all aspects of growing revenue for Ashtead Technology, both regionally and globally.

You will lead from the front; identifying and creating new business opportunities, be at the forefront of market trends & intelligence and develop & maintain excellent business relationships with clients.

This role is key to the growth plans of our business worldwide and the successful candidate will be a tenacious, target driven, go-getter!

What experience you’ll bring:

What will help you be successful in this role?
• Experience in a similar role within the offshore equipment & services sector, preferably in a subsea environment.
• You will have a track record of delivering revenue growth regionally & globally.
• Clear commercial instinct and acumen
• Strong interpersonal skills; you can build relationships easily and influence, negotiating effectively

Who we are:

Established in 1985, Ashtead Technology is the leading provider of equipment rental solutions, advanced underwater technologies, and support services to the global energy sector. With over 38 years of proven track record, we offer unrivalled technical know-how, experience, and in-house engineering capability. Recognized as one of the largest independent rental fleets in the industry with over 520 staff globally and over 19,000 assets, we continue to invest in equipment to ensure that we provide the broadest and most technologically advanced equipment available to support our customers globally.

What we can offer:
• A dynamic & collaborative team environment where your contributions are valued, and your ideas welcomed.
• A positive and inclusive company culture that fosters collaboration, creativity, and mutual respect among team members.
